storyInfo: Bison and Mostima, while wandering around seemingly without a care in the world, are attacked by the Mafia when they pass by a candy store. In order to throw off their tracking, Bison jumps onto a cargo ship, but Mostima goes missing.

attributes.content: Phew... It's getting late. Time to go home and sleep...
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: This is a great place to run a seafood stand. I can't believe how many customers came through. Hm? Is that...?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Hey.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: I'll break this arm if I have to.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: It's me, it's me! Let go!
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Huh? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I just closed up. I'm on my way home.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: You're the one who's here spacing out—— Well, I guess it's not spacing out if you can flip around and snap my neck like that...
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Did you hear that car accident just now, up on the overpass?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: ...aren't you supposed to be studying?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: One must strike a balance between recreation and labor. If I spent the whole night before the exam cramming, I'd go in there with my brain totally fried.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Yeah, sure.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: I heard some customers talking about it. I hope nobody died.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Same... but I heard something at the office. I guess there's some real unsavory characters mixed up in this...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Let's get this out of the way: I have nothing to do with any killers, gangs, or anyone in that world. You know that, right?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Everybody knows your deal—— Or maybe I should just say, with this attitude of yours, it's natural to be a little suspicious?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: ...right. I get it.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: And there was a gas explosion on a highway in the outskirts just two hours ago.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: A gas explosion on a highway? That's a pretty convenient explanation.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Hey, you're not thinking...?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: I told you: one must strike a balance between recreation and labor.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: ...right. I get it.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: So is this recreation or labor?
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: There we go. They can't do anything downtown like this. Too many people.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You ordered the matcha, right? This one's yours. My treat.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I don't see any mafia-looking guys, but... aren't we letting our guard down a bit too much?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: What are you talking about? This place is a FIVE STAR recommendation. That's way more awesome than some mobsters.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You been able to contact Texas and them yet?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: No, it was so fast...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: So what's to be all nervous about?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Your ice cream's melting. You gotta calm down already.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Er, it's just... nobody could have predicted this. I should calm down.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: These mobsters came aaall the way from Siracusa to Lungmen. We can bet they're not here for Sauin, right?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: ...They definitely have some other goal. One of them is me, but beyond that, I don't know.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: We're in a good position. We managed to lose them. And with just the two of us versus however many of them, we have the advantage in scouting them out...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: But how do we proceed? Should we start hunting them? No, the better move is to reconnect with Texas...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Heh. You seem a lot more like an ordinary Messenger than Texas and the girls.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Oh, sorry, was I talking to myself?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: No, you're right.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: We know the mob is up to something, we can't just go off half cocked.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: But sometimes you gotta trust in the girls. I know they can be a little out there, but Penguin Logistics is a tough cookie.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: It's kind of weird to call a logistics firm 'tough,' but... Forget it. It's not like I've got any room to complain.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Let's just take a walk, enjoy the scenery. And maybe by the time we run into Texas and the crew, they'll have this whole gang war all wrapped up?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: ...erm, really?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Mostima?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: You see that candy store?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: It's really more of a stall than a store.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Hm, it is pretty old.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I came here on a trip to Lungmen years ago.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Back then... I didn't have any Lungmen dollars on me. Honestly, I must've looked a sight. But still, I found myself drawn to the candy.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: O... kay.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: That's what a Messenger does. We get into trouble on our long and arduous journeys.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: C'mon, let's take a look.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Wow! It's a twinkly star!
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Mister, how did you pull a star down here?
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Sorry, but that's a secret I'll have to keep.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: That's not a star! It's just a candy with some food coloring!
attributes.name: Little Boy

attributes.content: But I've never seen such a pretty candy before... you sure you don't want one?
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Y- you're such a pain! Don't they have any cotton candy?
attributes.name: Little Boy

attributes.content: Of course we do. Here, give me your hand.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Oh... but I don't want cotton candy. I want that one...
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: I hate fruity candies! They're too sweet! And they turn your tongue weird colors!
attributes.name: Little Boy

attributes.content: Just take what you want. No charge. For Sauin.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Now it's getting late. You kids hurry home and get to bed!
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Thanks, mister!
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Hurry up! I wanna go to the toy store and check out the limited Sauin knights they got!
attributes.name: Little Boy

attributes.content: Kids these days have so much energy.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Did you want something? We've got these lovely Victorian gumdrops. Real imports. And they come with a candle for Sauin.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: We're in no hurry. The night is young.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Ho ho. And so are you. You two must be here for the downtown Carnival.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: (Mostima, who is this guy...?)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: ...you enjoy the nightlife, sir?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Not with these old bones I don't. But the candy I sell tends to make its way there for me.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Is there something special about this year's Carnival Gala? Looks like a lot of foreign guests in town.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Things have been quiet in this town for too many years. The people are definitely itching for the Carnival.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: The Carnival brings in all kinds of characters showing up getting into all kinds of trouble. And that's pretty fun, isn't it?
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Yeah, for sure.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: The point of Sauin was always to see off the souls of the departed. If the living are having a good time, that's a decent sacrifice.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: You really don't want anything? Last time, you stood outside with your face stuck to the display window. I thought I was gonna have to peel you off.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Wow, you remember me? That's kind of embarrassing.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Hah. How could I forget?
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: I'd love to. But I really can't be eating too many sweets before work.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: That's too bad... Ah well, have a good evening, kids.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Do come again, when you have time.
attributes.name: Old Man

attributes.content: Yeah. Of course.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: The Carnival, huh? I heard it's the biggest festival event for Lungmen in years.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: ......Bison?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Sorry, I just had something on my mind...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: It's pretty obvious what you'd be thinking about at a time like this.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: But boy do you love thinking too much. Just go with your gut sometimes.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: My gut... even a Messenger like you says to trust your gut?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: You play it case by case. Like right now we're up here on a bridge, and there's a cargo ship passing down below us.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Okay?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: And we got three disguised mobsters coming at us from both directions.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Wha!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: It's too late now. They've been watching us for a while.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Since the candy store.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: We- we're surrounded?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: There's tourists all around us, so we can't fight.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: But I'm not sure these guys have any hangups about that.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: ...so what do we do?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Jump.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I'm sorry?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Jump. Now.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Off the bridge——?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: There you go with that thinking again. Hop over the railing. Take a leap of faith. Like so——!
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: W- wait a sec——
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Welp! Somehow I feel like this isn't my first time in freefall....
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: It's... candy? Why is this freighter hauling candy?
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: But at least it looks like we lost them, Mostima——
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Mostima?
attributes.name: Bison
